name: Playstation 5 - Store app concept design
description:
Hi Guys, as you know today was a presentation of Playstation 5. I was really waiting to this announcement and the design of the new console, as well as the games that will be released on it in 2020. So I decided to make the concept of the product page used the neumorphism style in this work.


What's inside :

- DualSense Controller Page

- All Products Page


I am always available for new projects!
